data.actual_result: It shows only half of letter 'N'. This only seems to happen on small screened devices.
data.expected_result: It should either show it as my full name (i.e. PLAYERUNKNOWN) or a part of it followed by 3 dots (i.e. PLAYERUN...).
data.short_description: Having long names as mine, shows only half letters in the place where your name is.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a long name as mine. - Open the channel drawer. - Observe the place where your name is.
